actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to regulate interstate and foreign commerce in order to provide early warning of plant closings and relocations to those locally affected.

summary.text: Requires notification to employees and the community of plant closing and relocations by persons acquiring a plant or by owners of a plant. Imposes civil and criminal penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to regulate interstate and foreign commerce in order to provide early warning of plant closings and relocations to those locally affected.
